21-0178.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a summary report from Economic Development Department staff regarding feedback from the Economic Equity Studies and Community Roundtables directed by the City Council as part of the process for developing an equitable economic recovery strategy.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke; and provideda PowerPoint presentation.Chair Mungo spoke.Jeremy Harris spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and Jeremy Harris.Chair Mungo spoke.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Chair Mungo and John Keisler, Director of Economic Development.Nick Schultz, Executive Director, Pacific Gateway Workforce, spoke.Vice Chair Richardson spoke.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke.Nick Schultz, Executive Director, Pacific Gateway Workforce, spoke.Vice Chair Richardson spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.Councilwoman Allen spoke.Page 2 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMTUESDAY, MARCH 2, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MINUTESA motion was made by Chair Mungo, seconded by Vice Chair Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Mungo, Richardson and Allen3.

21-0179.summary: Recommendation to conduct, receive and file a Study Session, andreceive input from Economic Development & Finance CommitteeMembers and members of the public for the development of anequitable economic recovery strategy to help Long Beach businessesand workers quickly and effectively recover from the economichardship caused by COVID-19 and refer the recommended strategy tothe City Council for consideration on March 16, 2021.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke; and provideda PowerPoint presentation.Councilwoman Allen spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.Vice Chair Richardson spoke.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke.A dialogue ensued between Vice Chair Richardson and John Keisler, Director of Economic Development.Chair Mungo spoke.John Keisler, Director of Economic Development, spoke.Councilwoman Allen spoke.Vice Chair Richardson spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.Shirin Senegal spoke.Karen Cervantes spoke.Page 3 of 4TELECONFERENCE, 3:30 PMTUESDAY, MARCH 2, 2021CITY OF LONG BEACHECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND FINANCE COMMITTEE MINUTESAllison Kripp spoke.Chair Mungo spoke.A motion was made by Chair Mungo, seconded by Vice Chair Richardson, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 3 - Mungo, Richardson and Allen4.
